```{r setup}
library(cardinalR)
library(langevitour)
```

```{r}
mobius_data <- mobius_5d(sample_size = 300, num_noise_dims = 2, 
          min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

colnames(mobius_data) <- paste0("x", 1:NCOL(mobius_data))

langevitour(mobius_data, pointSize = 2)
```

```{r}
mobius_clust_data <- mobius_cluster_with_noise(sample_size = 500, 
num_noise_dims = 2, min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

colnames(mobius_clust_data) <- paste0("x", 1:NCOL(mobius_clust_data))

langevitour(mobius_clust_data, pointSize = 2)
```
